resume_text:
NAME: Michael Brown
EMAIL: michael.brown@email.com
PHONE: 555-789-0123

SUMMARY:
Experienced Cloud Architect with a proven track record of designing and implementing scalable and secure cloud solutions. Seeking a leadership role where I can drive cloud adoption and transformation.

SKILLS:
AWS, Azure, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, CloudFormation, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Global Cloud Services - Cloud Architect (2017 - Present)
- Designed and implemented cloud solutions for enterprise clients.
- Led cloud migration projects and provided technical guidance.
Software Consulting Group - Senior Software Engineer (2015 - 2017)
- Developed and maintained web applications using Java and Spring.
- Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated with databases.

EDUCATION:
Carnegie Mellon University - Master's in Computer Science (2015)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Google Cloud Professional
